      • getScoreTable

        @NotNull
java.util.Map<org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team,java.lang.Integer> getScoreTable(@NotNull
                                                                                    org.bukkit.scoreboard.Objective objective)

        Score table records the total score of each team.

        Each entry of this Map is a pair of objects: Team (key) and score (value). Map entires are arranged into descending order, based on score. Thus, the team with the highest score is the first element.

        Returns:
        A Map storing each team's score.
        See Also:
        Map, Team, score, score

      • assignPlayer

        void assignPlayer(@NotNull
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  @NotNull
                  org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team)

        Assign player to team.

        Player is automatically removed from the previous team if necessary.

        See Also:
        player, team

      • assignPlayers

        void assignPlayers(int number,
                   @NotNull
                   org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team)

        A fixed number of players are drawn, excluding those who have a team. The selected players will be assigned to the Team.

        Parameters:
        number - The number of players to select.
        team - The team where selected players should be assigned to.
        See Also:
        number, Team

      • assignPlayers

        void assignPlayers(float ratio,
                   @NotNull
                   org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team)

        A set of players are drawn by ratio, excluding those who have a team. The selected players will be assigned to the Team.

        Parameters:
        ratio - The proportion among the players who don't have a team yet. (0.0 to 1.0)
        team - The team where selected players should be assigned to.
        See Also:
        ratio, Team

        Parameters:
        team - Team instance
        kits - Array of Strings each representing the kit name
        Throws:

      • setSpawnpoint

        void setSpawnpoint(@NotNull
                   org.bukkit.scoreboard.Team team,
                   @NotNull
                   java.lang.String spawnTag)

        Set spawnpoint for the team.

        Parameters:
        team - The target Team.
        spawnTag - Name of the coordinate tag which captures spawnpoints.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if spawnTag is not in this game.
